name: Paranormal Files:The Missing Pilot
description:
On the evening of Saturday, 21 October 1978 a pilot doing a routine flight begins to see something strange.  What starts of a normal flight ends in  giant mystery when the pilot goes missing. Before he disappeared he radioed in looking  if any other aircraft in the area not knowing that it will be the last time anyone hears from him 

This project was made for the One script jam and was made within one week of development by one person. The the theme for the jam was leaving something behind and the only thing left behind where more questions!

How To Play 

-PC 

 Just click where to move 

-mobile(android coming soon) 

  touch to move the plane

-The main objective is to survive if you run out of power the game ends and will give you a retry and is meant to be beaten  in under 5 mins 

This is a protoype and is known to have a few bugs
